name: Premonition of Avoidance
summary: Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur.
description:
Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw.Premonition of Avoidance Leads To...

Shared Avoidance
trigger: You attempt a saving throw against a hazard, but you haven't rolled yet.
